extendedInfo.description: SwissGrid displays the location received by GPS in Swiss grid coordinates (Schweizer Landeskoordinaten), which is very usefull when you want to determine your location on a Swiss map.You can also convert Swiss coordinates into WGS (world-) coordinates and vice-versa. Entered coordinates can then be displayed on a map.You can also determine the Swiss grid coordinates of any location by taping on Google map.As a new feature, a compass is now included.If you have questions or encounter problems, please send me an e-mail since I can't answer on comments here.

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Nice tool. Simple but beautiful interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says, no problem on htc desire.
reviews.author: A Google User
